net.tridentsdk.world

Interface Chunk

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ChunkSnapshot
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TridentChunk, TridentChunkSnapshot

    @ThreadSafe
public interface Chunk
    Represents a 16x16x256 cube of blocks which stores a partition of the world's data
    Since:
    0.3-alpha-DP
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Block blockAt(int relX, int y, int relZ)
      Obtains a block relative to the chunk
      Set<Entity> entities()
      The entities in the chunk
      void generate()
      Generates the chunk
      ArrayList<Entity> getEntities(Entity exclude, BoundingBox boundingBox, java.util.function.Predicate<? super Entity> predicate)
      Find all entities that are colliding with the bounding box
      boolean isLoaded()
      Checks the chunk to ensure it is loaded
      boolean load()
      Loads the chunk
      ChunkLocation location()
      The location of the chunk
      ChunkSnapshot snapshot()
      Obtains a snapshot of the state of the chunk
      Collection<Tile> tiles()
      Obtains the tile entities in this chunk
      void unload()
      Unloads the chunk
      World world()
      The world which contains this chunk

      Shortcut for: location().x()
      int z()
      Shortcut for: location().z()

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        void generate()
        Generates the chunk

      • load

        boolean load()
        Loads the chunk
        Returns:
        true to signify that the chunk was successfully loaded from file, false to signify that it does not exist on file, or already loaded

      • isLoaded

        boolean isLoaded()
        Checks the chunk to ensure it is loaded
        Returns:
        true to signify that the chunk is loaded, false if it is not

      • unload

        void unload()
        Unloads the chunk

      • entities

        Set<Entity> entities()
        The entities in the chunk
        Returns:
        the entities

      • getEntities

        ArrayList<Entity> getEntities(Entity exclude,
                              BoundingBox boundingBox,
                              java.util.function.Predicate<? super Entity> predicate)
        Find all entities that are colliding with the bounding box
        Parameters:
        exclude - the entity to exclude from the search
        boundingBox - The bounding box to search in
        predicate - Predicate to filter results
        Returns:
        List of entities inside the bounding box

      • tiles

        Collection<Tile> tiles()
        Obtains the tile entities in this chunk
        Returns:
        the tile entities

      • location

        ChunkLocation location()
        The location of the chunk
        Returns:
        the chunk's location

      • x

        int x()
        Shortcut for: location().x()
        Returns:
        the chunk's x coordinate

      • z

        int z()
        Shortcut for: location().z()
        Returns:
        the chunk's z coordinate

      • world

        World world()
        The world which contains this chunk
        Returns:
        the containing world

      • blockAt

        Block blockAt(int relX,
              int y,
              int relZ)
        Obtains a block relative to the chunk
        Parameters:
        relX - the relative x 0-15
        y - the y coordinate
        relZ - the relative z 0-15
        Returns:
        the block at that coordinate

      • snapshot

        ChunkSnapshot snapshot()
        Obtains a snapshot of the state of the chunk
        Returns:
        the chunk's frozen state which can be restored
